ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( OR( AND( ISBLANK(cgcloud__Bill_To_Role_Valid_From__c), ISBLANK(cgcloud__Bill_To_Role_Valid_Thru__c)), AND( NOT ISBLANK(cgcloud__Bill_To_Role_Valid_From__c), NOT ISBLANK(cgcloud__Bill_To_Role_Valid_Thru__c), cgcloud__Bill_To_Role_Valid_From__c<= cgcloud__Bill_To_Role_Valid_Thru__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Valid From and Valid Thru can't be empty and Valid From can't be later than Valid Thru if the Role 'Bill To' is assigned to the Customer.
